name: Host Metrics (Open Telemetry)
description: The Sumo Logic App for Host Metrics allows you to collect your host metrics using Sumo Logic distro for Open Telemetry and display them using predefined search queries and Dashboards. The App provides Dashboards to display analysis of host metrics metrics for cpu, disk, memory, network.

children.name: 1. AWS EC2 Metrics - Overview (Host Metrics) (OTEL) DONE
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Overview dashboard provides at-a-glance information about a EC2 CPU, memory, network and disk usage.
children.title: 1. AWS EC2 Metrics - Overview (Host Metrics) (OTEL) DONE

panels.title: Overall Average CPU Load (1m, 5m, 15m)
panels.visualSettings: {"general":{"mode":"timeSeries"},"color":{"family":"scheme7"},"axes":{"axisY":{"title":"Average CPU Load"}},"overrides":[{"series":[],"queries":["A"],"userProvidedChartType":false,"properties":{"name":"1 Minute Average CPU Load"}},{"series":[],"queries":["B"],"userProvidedChartType":false,"properties":{"name":"5 Minute Average CPU Load"}},{"series":[],"queries":["C"],"userProvidedChartType":false,"properties":{"name":"15 Minute Average CPU Load"}}],"series":{}}

panels.title: Total Free System Memory per Hostname
Total Used, Less Buffers and Cached Memory per Hostname

queries.queryString: metric=system.memory.utilization and (state=cached  or state=used)| eval _value * 100| avg
metric=system.cpu.utilization _sourcehost={{hostname}} state=wait  | avg by _sourcecategory | filter avg >= 0.01 | eval _value * 100

panels.title: Instances with High CPU Utilization (low idle)

queries.queryString: metric=system.cpu.utilization _sourcehost={{hostname}}  state=idle | filter latest <= 0.4 | eval _value * 100 | avg  by _sourcehost
metric=system.memory.utilization  _sourcehost={{hostname}} and (state=used or state=cached) | sum by _collector | eval _value * 100 | filter avg >= 80
metric=system.cpu.utilization _sourcehost={{hostname}} state=user  | avg by _collector | topk(24, avg) by _collector  | eval _value * 100
metric=system.memory.utilization  _sourcehost={{hostname}} state=used | avg by _collector | topk(24, avg) by _collector | eval _value * 100

panels.title: Average CPU Utilization by Instance Type

queries.queryString: metric=system.cpu.utilization _sourcehost={{hostname}} state=user | avg by _collector | topk(10, avg) by _collector

children.name: 1. AWS EC2 Metrics - Summary (Host Metrics) (OTEL) DONE
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Summary dashboard provides at-a-glance information about a EC2 CPU, memory, network and disk usage.
children.title: 1. AWS EC2 Metrics - Summary (Host Metrics) (OTEL) DONE

panels.title: Overall Average CPU Load (1m, 5m, 15m)
panels.visualSettings: {"general":{"mode":"timeSeries"},"color":{"family":"scheme7"},"axes":{"axisY":{"title":"Average CPU Load"}},"overrides":[{"series":[],"queries":["A"],"userProvidedChartType":false,"properties":{"name":"1 Minute Average CPU Load"}},{"series":[],"queries":["B"],"userProvidedChartType":false,"properties":{"name":"5 Minute Average CPU Load"}},{"series":[],"queries":["C"],"userProvidedChartType":false,"properties":{"name":"15 Minute Average CPU Load"}}],"series":{}}

panels.title: Total Used, Less Buffers and Cached Memory

children.name: 2. AWS EC2 Metrics - CPU (Host Metrics) (OTEL) DONE
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - CPU dashboard provides details information about a EC2 CPU usage.
children.title: 2. AWS EC2 Metrics - CPU (Host Metrics) (OTEL) DONE

children.name: 3. AWS EC2 Metrics - Memory (Host Metrics) (OTEL) WIP
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Memory dashboard provides details information about a EC2 memory usage.
children.title: 3. AWS EC2 Metrics - Memory (Host Metrics) (OTEL) WIP

panels.title: Total Free, Buffers and Cached Memory
Total Used, Less Buffers and Cached Memory

children.name: 4. AWS EC2 Metrics - Disk (Host Metrics) (OTEL)
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Disk dashboard provides details information about a EC2 Disk usage.
children.title: 4. AWS EC2 Metrics - Disk (Host Metrics) (OTEL)

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Used | sum by account, region, namespace, instanceid, dirname, devname
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Available | sum by account, region, namespace, instanceid, dirname, devname
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Reads | sum by instanceid | rate
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_ReadBytes | sum by instanceid | rate
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Writes | sum by instanceid | rate
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_WriteBytes | sum by instanceid | rate
metric=Disk_UsedPercent account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} | sum by account, region, namespace, instanceid, dirname, devname
metric=Disk_Queue account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} | sum by account, region, namespace, instanceid, dirname, devname

children.name: 5. AWS EC2 Metrics - Network (Host Metrics) (OTEL)
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Network dashboard provides details information about a EC2 Network activities based on In and out packets, bytes.
children.title: 5. AWS EC2 Metrics - Network (Host Metrics) (OTEL)

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InPackets | sum by instanceid | rate
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutPackets | sum by instanceid | rate
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InBytes | sum by instanceid | rate
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutBytes | sum by instanceid | rate

children.name: 6. AWS EC2 Metrics - TCP (Host Metrics) (OTEL)
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - TCP dashboard provides details information about a EC2 connection details.
children.title: 6. AWS EC2 Metrics - TCP (Host Metrics) (OTEL)

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_InboundTotal | sum by account, region, namespace, instanceid
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_OutboundTotal | sum by account, region, namespace, instanceid
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_Listen | sum by account, region, namespace, instanceid
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_Established | sum by account, region, namespace, instanceid
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_TimeWait | sum by account, region, namespace, instanceid
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_Idle | sum by account, region, namespace, instanceid
account={{account}} region={{region}} instanceid={{instanceid}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_Close | sum by account, region, namespace, instanceid
